```{r}
library(ggplot2) # Data visualization
library(readr) # CSV file I/O, e.g. the read_csv function
library(psych)
library(dplyr)

Beers <- read.csv('Beers.csv')
Beers[is.na(Beers)]<- 0
str(Beers)
describe(Beers)
```
